```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Step 1. Attach necessary libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)
library(janitor)
library(here)
library(plotly)
library(DT)
library(lubridate)
```

Step 2. Read in lobster file + make it tidy
```{r}
lobster_raw <- read_csv("lobster_abundance_sbc_lter.csv", na = "-99999")

lobster_tidy <- lobster_raw %>% 
  clean_names() %>%
  tidyr::uncount(count) %>% 
  select(year:size_mm)
```
